group_1.textRight: Huh? What are you doing on your phone with@such a serious face...?

group_1.textLeft: Ah... Um, you see...@I was searching for some sweets to try...

group_1.textRight: Searching for sweets?!@With that serious of an expression?!
That's what's so great about Moka, though!@She's all about appetite, not romance.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, haha... Right...

group_1.textRight: Aww, that bombshell body and you don't even do@anything with it! Talk about sinful~!

group_1.textLeft: Do anything...with it...?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, totally!
All those guys you don't pay attention to have@got to be literally dying!
So, what kind of sweets are you searching for?
Ooh, I know, I know!@Lemme give you some of my recommendations!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, you're more about appetite than romance@too, aren't you? Hardly sinful, though.

group_1.textRight: Shut it...
I recently had this one... It was delicious!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:303401:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Ah! Yeah! I love that one!@The dough was so sticky, and yet...

group_1.textRight: (I wanna say that Moka is a glutton...)

group_1.textCenter: (I wanna say that Moka is a glutton...)

group_1.textLeft: (I wanna say that Moka is a glutton...)

group_1.textRight: You! You gluttonous angel~!!

group_1.narration: "Let me explain!@So, what is the Mocha Law?@Well, since we can't help but love@Moka Megumi, the angel of our class...@Us girls are now her unofficial caretakers!"

group_1.textLeft: Mocha Law Article 3, consent!!

group_1.textRight: Ah, Article 3... A Mocha caretaker shall not be@compelled to touch the skin...
I-I'm sorry...

group_1.textLeft: No, it's fine!@[chara:303401:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:303401:cheek_0][chara:303401:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:303401:lipSynch_1]Let's eat mochi together sometime...!

group_1.textRight: Uuu...
She's such an angel...

group_1.textLeft: Ah, this place might be good!

group_1.textRight: ...Ah, you found a good sweets shop.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, maybe I'll stop by after school...
[chara:303401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh!?
KYAAAA!!

group_1.textRight: What's the matter!?

group_1.textLeft: T-There, on that desk...! A bug...!

group_1.textRight: What!? Where is it!?@Come out, you vile insect brute!!
I'll crush you!
...[wait:1][chara:800200:lipSynch_1] I don't see it...

group_1.textLeft: Huh...!?[chara:303401:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:303401:lipSynch_1] Oh, yeah...

group_1.textRight: Maybe... Maybe it was the boys!?
They could have totally set up a radio-controlled@toy bug...
That's true! It DID happen before, after all.

group_1.textLeft: Then, they must be the culprits...

group_1.textCenter: No, wait! I didn't do it!

group_1.textLeft: Y-Yeah...@I didn't want to just assume that you did...
Poor guy... It's okay...

group_1.textRight: Sure, I set up a toy bug a while back...
And Moka's reaction was really funny...@[wait:1][chara:800500:cheek_0][chara:800500:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json]But I've reflected on my actions!
And even after I admitted it to Moka,@she simply laughed kindly and forgave me...
Moka is an angel!
I SWEAR THAT I WON'T DO IT ANYMORE!!

group_1.textLeft: You don't have to...swear on it...

group_1.textRight: I'D LOVE TO TAKE CARE OF YOU, MOKA!!
Hmm...@I don't have any proof, but I still don't trust him...

group_1.textCenter: At least he reflected on his past actions...

group_1.textLeft: But then, what was the bug...?
Well... I'm very sorry to tell you all this, but...
I think that I was mistaken...

group_1.textRight: Mistaken?

group_1.textLeft: There's the kanji for "back" here on this note...

group_1.textRight: "Back"...?

group_1.textLeft: It looks like a bug... Doesn't it?

group_1.textRight: Ah, so "moon" is the torso and "north" is the@wings and legs?
So, she mistook it...for a bug...

group_1.textLeft: Yes...
[chara:303401:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]I'm so sorry...

group_1.textRight: No, no, no!!@You don't have to apologize!!
Wooow! Moka's perspective is so creative!@Isn't she a genius!?
So whoever came up with these confusingly shaped kanji is clearly at fault...!

group_1.textLeft: I'm sure... That they are a much more accomplished scholar than me...

group_1.textCenter: You really spoil Moka...@[chara:800500:lipSynch_0][wait:1][chara:800500:cheek_0][chara:800500:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:800500:lipSynch_1]But I support you nonetheless!
